sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Restroom Access Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Restroom Access Act.

sections.heading: Retail establishment; customer access to restroom facilities
sections.text: A retail establishment that has a toilet facility for its employees shall allow a customer to use that facility during normal business hours if the toilet facility is reasonably safe and all of the following conditions are met:

sections.heading: Violation. A retail establishment or an employee of a retail establishment that violates Section 10 is guilty of a petty offense
sections.text: The penalty is a fine of not more than $100.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
